title: Heal & Holy Skill Spell Sound Pack
description: 116 Healer & Holy Sound for RPGs and fantasy games. Casts, impacts, buffs, and more in multiple variations to add depth to your game.
longDescription:
🔈View Sound List

🔈View Video Demo


Introducing "Heal & Holy Skill Spell Sound Pack," a meticulously crafted collection of 116 unique sound effects. This pack is dedicated to the mystical realms of healing and holy powers, offering a wide range of sounds for casting, looping, impact, projectiles, buffs, and armor related to the themes of healing and holiness. With multiple variations for each effect, this pack provides an extensive library of audio assets specifically designed for skills associated with characters like Priests and Paladins. By incorporating these diverse sound effects into your game, you can create a truly immersive experience that sets your RPG and fantasy games apart. Complete with ambient and drone sounds, this pack offers a versatile toolkit to enhance the audio landscape of your virtual worlds. Elevate the spiritual and magical elements of your game with this exceptional sound package.
technicalDetails:
Audio file types: .Wav

Sample rate: 44,100Hz Sample Rate

Bit depth: 320Kbps Bit rate

Number of Audio Waves: 116

Number of Audio Cues: 116

Additional: Stereo

Do Sound Fx Loop: Yes like cast skill

Windows and Mac:Yes

Support Dev Platarform: Yes
